root.Summary: 1: Gu Y, Zhang X, Yang Q, Wang JM, He YP, Sun ZG, Zhang HQ, Wang J. Uterine NDRG2expression is increased at implantation sites during early pregnancy in mice, andits down-regulation inhibits decidualization of mouse endometrial stromal cells. Reprod Biol Endocrinol. 2015 May 27;13:49. doi: 10.1186/s12958-015-0047-7.Erratum in: Reprod Biol Endocrinol. 2015;13:98. PubMed PMID: 26013399; PubMedCentral PMCID: PMC4447025.
